${ModID}:BaronsCrown.NAME: Baron's Crown
${ModID}:BaronsCrown.FLAVOR: Wearing this crown will make anyone look more important.
DESCRIPTIONS: On pickup, choose a card. #yprofessor:Masterwork it and #yUpgrade it.

${ModID}:Cosmos.NAME: Cosmos
${ModID}:Cosmos.FLAVOR: An amulet that grants the wearer power beyond human knowledge. The effect is powerful, but also puts stress on the body.

${ModID}:ElixirRing.NAME: Elixir Ring
${ModID}:ElixirRing.FLAVOR: An exclusive ring for alchemists. It takes two Philosopher's Stones to craft.

${ModID}:EnergyPendant.NAME: Energy Pendant
${ModID}:EnergyPendant.FLAVOR: Just putting it on makes you feel less tired, so it's recommended for adventurers.

${ModID}:EnlightenedBandana.NAME: Enlightened Bandana
${ModID}:EnlightenedBandana.FLAVOR: The longer you wear it, the more it will hone your nerves and the stronger the effect will become.

${ModID}:FluffyTail.NAME: Fluffy Tail
${ModID}:FluffyTail.FLAVOR: Once you put it on, you can't remove it unless you get it wet, so you don't need to worry about losing it. Unless it's raining, of course.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start of combat Draw and Block?

${ModID}:FocusGlass.NAME: Focus Glass
${ModID}:FocusGlass.FLAVOR: Wearing these will reveal enemy weaknesses. The design is not very good, making them somewhat difficult to use.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b3 #yAttacks in a single turn, your next #yAttack deals #b50% more damage.

${ModID}:FourSpiritsAmulet.NAME: Four Spirits Amulet
${ModID}:FourSpiritsAmulet.FLAVOR: An amulet containing the blessings of the four elemental spirits. It's powerful, but extremely difficult to craft.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain E if you play all 4 elements in 1 turn?

${ModID}:GloryBelt.NAME: Glory Belt
${ModID}:GloryBelt.FLAVOR: The belt given to the champion of the yearly battle arena. There is only one of these in the entire world, so it probably shouldn't be here at all...

${ModID}:GnadeRing.NAME: Gnade Ring
${ModID}:GnadeRing.FLAVOR: A ring popular among adventurers. Its specific effects change according to how it's made.

${ModID}:HotBloodedBandana.NAME: Hot-Blooded Bandana
${ModID}:HotBloodedBandana.FLAVOR: Wrapping this around your head seems to provide extra motivation, but it will also make you tired much faster.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain E early, then gain weak?

${ModID}:InnocentRiches.NAME: Innocent Riches
${ModID}:InnocentRiches.FLAVOR: It's been reported that wearing it for too long can actually cause the tail's movement to affect the wearer's emotions.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upgraded cards exhaust and give gold

${ModID}:KaiserCape.NAME: Kaiser Cape
${ModID}:KaiserCape.FLAVOR: A thick cape once worn by a famous emperor when heading to war, raising the morale of soldiers fighting by his side.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a cost 2 or higher card, draw a card?

${ModID}:LocketOfDevotion.NAME: Locket of Devotion
${ModID}:LocketOfDevotion.FLAVOR: If you place a photo of someone you want to protect inside, it will allow you to shoulder their hardships.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces [#c66c8d]Memoria [#c66c8d]Bracelet. At the start of each turn, #yprofessor:Infuse "Deal 5 damage" into a random card in your hand.

${ModID}:MemoriaBracelet.NAME: Memoria Bracelet
${ModID}:MemoriaBracelet.FLAVOR: The bracelet made as a symbol of affection. It was designed with fashion in mind more than practical use.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yprofessor:Infuse "Deal 5 damage" into a random card in your hand.

${ModID}:MigratoryCharm.NAME: Migratory Charm
${ModID}:MigratoryCharm.FLAVOR: Wearing it helps keep your legs from getting tired or going numb, so it's perfect for long trips.

${ModID}:QuartzNecklace.NAME: Quartz Necklace
${ModID}:QuartzNecklace.FLAVOR: A necklace designed to last longer while using less metal. It's the perfect gift to give the object of your affection

${ModID}:SageCirclet.NAME: Sage Circlet
${ModID}:SageCirclet.FLAVOR: A circlet said to contain the knowledge of a legendary sage.

${ModID}:SamastenNecklace.NAME: Samasten Necklace
${ModID}:SamastenNecklace.FLAVOR: A choker decorated with Samasten, a surprisingly brittle ore.
DESCRIPTIONS: Some per turn effect, lost when attacked

${ModID}:SoulOfFortitude.NAME: Soul of Fortitude
${ModID}:SoulOfFortitude.FLAVOR: An accessory made for knights defending the kingdom. It's good at absorbing damage, making it great for long, drawn-out battles.

${ModID}:UniCharm.NAME: Uni Charm
${ModID}:UniCharm.FLAVOR: People always comment how creepily real it looks, which makes sense because it's made with an actual Uni.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you are attacked each combat, deal #b8 damage to ALL enemies.
